text: How would I describe our first kiss?
What’s my idea of a perfect date night?

options.text: A cozy movie night at home 🎬

text: If I wrote a love letter to you, what would I most likely say?

options.text: “You’re my world, and I can’t imagine life without you.” 🌎❤️
“Every day with you feels like a dream.” 💭💕
“You make my heart race faster than a rollercoaster.” 🎢💘
“I fall for you more and more every single day.” 🍂😍

text: Which romantic gesture would melt my heart the most?

options.text: A surprise love note hidden in my bag 💌
Breakfast in bed made with love 🥞💖
A playlist of songs that remind you of me 🎶💞

text: If we could visit any romantic city together, where would I want to go?

options.text: Kyoto, for a serene and beautiful escape 🍃🌸

text: What’s the best way to cheer me up when I’m feeling down?

options.text: My favorite snack and a movie 🍫🎥
Taking me on a surprise date 🎡😍

text: If I had to compare our love to a movie genre, what would it be?
What’s my favorite way to say ‘I love you’ without words?

options.text: Looking into your eyes and smiling 😍

text: If we could relive one special moment in our relationship, what would I choose?

options.text: A random, beautiful day we spent together 🌸😊

text: What’s something I love most about you?

options.text: Your sense of humor and fun personality 😂💖
The way you always support me no matter what 🤝❤️
Everything! You’re absolutely perfect to me 😘
